CreateMonitor.name: CreateMonitor
CreateMonitor.description: Grants permission to create a monitor

DeleteMonitor.name: DeleteMonitor
DeleteMonitor.description: Grants permission to delete a monitor

GetHealthEvent.name: GetHealthEvent
GetHealthEvent.description: Grants permission to get information about a health event for a specified monitor

GetInternetEvent.name: GetInternetEvent
GetInternetEvent.description: Grants permission to get information about a specified internet event

GetMonitor.name: GetMonitor
GetMonitor.description: Grants permission to get information about a monitor

GetQueryResults.name: GetQueryResults
GetQueryResults.description: Grants permission to get results for a data query for a monitor

GetQueryStatus.name: GetQueryStatus
GetQueryStatus.description: Grants permission to get status for a data query for a monitor

Link.name: Link
Link.description: Grants permission to share Internet Monitor resources with a monitoring account

ListHealthEvents.name: ListHealthEvents
ListHealthEvents.description: Grants permission to list all health events for a monitor

ListInternetEvents.name: ListInternetEvents
ListInternetEvents.description: Grants permission to list all internet events

ListMonitors.name: ListMonitors
ListMonitors.description: Grants permission to list all monitors in an account and their statuses

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to list the tags for a resource

StartQuery.name: StartQuery
StartQuery.description: Grants permission to start a data query for a monitor

StopQuery.name: StopQuery
StopQuery.description: Grants permission to stop a data query for a monitor

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to add tags to a resource

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to remove tags from a resource

UpdateMonitor.name: UpdateMonitor
UpdateMonitor.description: Grants permission to update a monitor
